org.twinnation.twinutilities

Class LogUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.twinnation.twinutilities.LogUtils

  • public final class LogUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class used to easily log events TODO: Add an option to select which logging level should be saved to a log (ex, WARN+ would save LEVEL_WARN and LEVEL_ERROR in a file whereas LEVEL_LOG and LEVEL_INFO would only be printed on the console)
